name: KIDO'Z
overview:
KIDO’Z is a Kid’s Web Environment that allows children to safely surf websites, watch videos and play games in an easy-to-use, protected environment.

KIDOâ€™Z v1.0 is a secure and easy-to-use Kidâ€™s Web Environment that brings kids between the ages of 3-7 years the best and most relevant childrenâ€™s content that is available on the web.

KIDOâ€™Z is a hub of both KIDOâ€™Z generated content and parent-generated content (in over 160 languages) which allows parents, through the password-protected Control Panel, to personalize content according to differing variables pertaining to their child, such as age, language, interests, gender, nationality. Parents are able add their own content to KIDO’Z, as well as being able to block content from their child’s account.

Parents also have the option to share their content, creating a sense of community.

All content is moderated and pre-approved by the KIDOâ€™Z Team.

The graphical, interactive user interface is designed to be used by young children, who can navigate the environment without needing to know how to read or write.

The KIDO’Z application is available in 17 different languages.
